page.title: 03FARMERS' CENTRE
page.content: Known as the{'Farmers' Centre'.}The premises are at Scots Gap,on old Railway sidings,adjacent to the Auction Mart.There is a { {Warehouse,Showroom,Offices and {Workshops.} They are agricultural merchants,stock animal health products,sell clothing and footwear,paints and hardware.They supply and repair televisions,videos and electrical goods,as well as all types of horticultural equipment and chainsaws. {Area served:}Alnwick to Newcastle (East)and Keilder to Hexham(West). {Employ:}4 office staff, 3 television engineers, 3 horticultural mechanics, 4 lorry drivers, 1 warehouseman There are 4 Managing Partners.
